# Business Wish - Tailwind CSS UI Components Library

> Business Wish is a comprehensive, free library of high-quality Tailwind CSS UI components designed for modern web developers. Built with React, Next.js, and TypeScript, it provides copy-paste ready components with dark mode support and accessibility features.

## Key Features

- **50+ Components**: Comprehensive collection including buttons, cards, forms, navigation, data display, and layout components
- **Copy-Paste Ready**: One-click copy functionality with syntax highlighting
- **Dark Mode Support**: All components include built-in dark mode variants
- **Accessibility First**: WCAG compliant components with proper ARIA attributes
- **TypeScript Support**: Full type safety and IntelliSense support
- **Framework Agnostic**: Works with Next.js, Vite, Create React App, and other React frameworks

## Documentation

- [Getting Started Guide](https://business-wish.vercel.app/docs/getting-started.html.md): Quick setup and installation instructions
- [Component Categories](https://business-wish.vercel.app/docs/components.html.md): Organized by Layout, Data Display, Form Controls, Feedback, Overlays, Content, and Utilities
- [Design System](https://business-wish.vercel.app/docs/design-system.html.md): Colors, typography, spacing, and accessibility guidelines
- [Migration Guide](https://business-wish.vercel.app/docs/migration.html.md): Version upgrade instructions and breaking changes

## Popular Components

- [Button Component](https://business-wish.vercel.app/docs/components/button.html.md): Multiple variants, sizes, and states
- [Card Component](https://business-wish.vercel.app/docs/components/card.html.md): Flexible content containers with various layouts
- [Data Table](https://business-wish.vercel.app/docs/components/data-table.html.md): Sortable, filterable tables with pagination
- [Hero Sections](https://business-wish.vercel.app/docs/components/hero.html.md): Landing page hero components
- [Navigation](https://business-wish.vercel.app/docs/components/header.html.md): Responsive navigation bars and menus

## Examples

- [Blog List Components](https://business-wish.vercel.app/docs/pages/blog-list.html.md): Various blog layout patterns
- [Error Pages](https://business-wish.vercel.app/docs/pages/404.html.md): Custom 404 and error page designs
- [Form Examples](https://business-wish.vercel.app/docs/components/form.html.md): Complete form implementations with validation

## Optional

- [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs): Official Tailwind CSS reference
- [Radix UI Primitives](https://www.radix-ui.com/primitives): Underlying accessible component primitives
- [Lucide React Icons](https://lucide.dev/guide/packages/lucide-react): Icon library used throughout components
